messages.message:
The docs team deploys Platform docs via a GitHub Action. Over the weekend, that action stopped being able to checkout the `instabase` repo, which it needs because some of the docs content lives there.

Maybe the error comes from a year-old-plus GitHub secret called `INSTABASE_REPO_RO_TOKEN` having expired. Anyone know if that can happen, or have other thoughts on what might be causing the error?

Details:
• Full error message: https://github.com/instabase/instabase-docs/actions/runs/10563114923/job/29263671980
• GH Action that  uses the secret: https://github.com/instabase/instabase-docs/blob/53ff11ab521dc33dfdb504b007e32c52c198fe42/.github/workflows/DeployPlatformDocs.yml#L63C30-L63C53
